product_name: Marmot Oracle Rain Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering waterproof, breathable protection and sporty style, the women's Marmot Oracle Rain Jacket is feature-loaded so you can hike, backpack or climb in wet or iffy weather. Marmot Oracle offers great lightweight coverage and a comfortable fit with durable stretch fabric in key movement areas. MemBrain(R) Strata(TM) 2.5-layer waterproof, breathable laminate reduces internal condensation to effectively increase your comfort range without weighing you down. Durable and fully protective, the Oracle jacket features microstitched and seam-taped seams. Adjustable brimmed storm hood provides unhindered peripheral vision; hood zips off. Soft DriClime(R) lines the collar, cuffs and chin guard for added softness and warmth. PitZips(TM) allow excellent ventilation control. Elastic drawcord hem and rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs. Zippered hand pockets. Articulated elbows on sleeves allow comfortable, unrestricted range of motion. Marmot Oracle Rain Jacket for women is designed to fit over a fleece or soft shell. Closeout.
short_description: Offering waterproof, breathable protection and sporty style, the women's Marmot Oracle Rain Jacket is feature-loaded so you can hike, backpack or climb in wet or iffy weather.
